AboutPage.title: Our Story
AboutPage.subtitle: Every company has its own story - and ours is no exception.

history.title: How RVS was born?
history.part1: My name is Roman Shahalevich, and my journey in the construction industry began long before I thought about my own business. As a student, I spent a lot of time helping my father in the family construction company. If someone had told me then that one day I would continue the family business and even open my own company, I probably wouldn't have believed it.
history.part2: But life itself shows us the right path. Years of working shoulder to shoulder with my father gave me invaluable experience - both theoretical and practical. I learned not only to operate equipment or manage processes but also to understand people, find solutions in difficult situations, and ensure that clients are always satisfied with the result.
history.part3: Over time, I felt ready to take a decisive step - to create my own company based on the values I learned from my father. That's how RVS was born - my 'pride' and, you could say, my 'child'.
history.part4: Years of working with various clients - from large companies to individuals - have taught me an important truth: success in this business is not just about providing services or making deals. It is, first and foremost, about building trusting and long-term relationships based on respect and honesty.
history.part5: Some of my first clients have over time become not just regular customers but also reliable partners, sometimes even friends. I believe that this is what distinguishes RVS - a company built not only on a solid foundation of knowledge and experience but also on sincere relationships with those for whom we work.
history.part6: At RVS, we build not only buildings - we create relationships that stand the test of time.

Reviews.title: Client Reviews
Reviews.subtitle: What our clients say about us

items.text: Excellent team of professionals! They renovated our office exactly on time. I was especially pleased with the attention to detail and cleanliness during the work.
We ordered the construction of a private house. The guys worked at the highest level - from design to delivery of the object. Everything is clear, transparent and high-quality.
We rented equipment for earthworks from the company. The equipment is new, in excellent condition. The operators are real professionals. I recommend!

Portfolio.title: Our Works
Portfolio.description: Our services cover all key aspects of construction, from site preparation and earthworks to the construction of buildings and structures.

items.question: In which regions do you work?
items.answer: We provide construction services in Ida-Virumaa. If your property is outside this region, please contact us for details.

items.question: How to request a consultation?
items.answer: You can submit a request on our website, call us at (+372) 53 320 419, or fill out the form on our website in the 'contact' section. Our specialist will contact you to discuss the details.

items.question: Do you help with the selection of materials?
items.answer: Yes, we select optimal construction and finishing materials taking into account the budget and wishes of the client.

items.question: Do you work with client's materials?
items.answer: Yes, if the materials meet quality and safety requirements. However, we recommend consulting with our specialists before purchasing.

items.question: Do you provide landscaping services?
items.answer: Yes, we perform landscaping work, paving, fence installation, and other types of landscaping.
